name: Ningguang
title: Eclipsing Star
description: The Tianquan of the Liyue Qixing. Her wealth is unsurpassed in all of Teyvat.

normal.2: Upon hit, this grants Ningguang 1 Star Jade.

charged.1: Consumes a certain amount of stamina to fire off a giant gem that deals <geo>Geo DMG</geo>.
charged.2: If Ningguang has any Star Jades, unleashing a Charged Attack will cause the Star Jades to be fired at the enemy as well, dealing additional DMG.

plunging.1: Gathering the might of Geo, Ningguang plunges towards the ground from mid-air, damaging all opponents in her path. Deals <geo>AoE Geo DMG</geo> upon impact with the ground.

description.0: Ningguang creates a Jade Screen out of gold, obsidian, and her great opulence, dealing <geo>AoE Geo DMG</geo>.
3: Endurance scales based on Ningguang's Max HP.
description.5: Jade Screen is considered a <geo>Geo Construct</geo> and can be used to block certain attacks, but cannot be climbed. Only one Jade Screen may exist at any one time.
description.7: The canvas of stars is written upon this jade screen.

description.0: Gathering a great number of gems, Ningguang scatters them all at once, sending homing projectiles at her opponents that deal massive <geo>Geo DMG</geo>.
description.1: If Starshatter is cast when a Jade Screen is nearby, the Jade Screen will fire additional gem projectiles at the same time.

description.0: When Ningguang is in possession of Star Jades, her Charged Attack does not consume Stamina.
A character that passes through the Jade Screen will gain a 12% Geo DMG Bonus for 10s.
Displays the location of nearby ore veins used in forging on the mini-map.
When a Normal Attack hits, it deals AoE DMG.
When Jade Screen is shattered, its CD will reset.

constellation3.name: Majesty Be the Array of Stars

constellation4.name: Exquisite be the Jade, Outshining All Beneath

description.0: Jade Screen increases nearby characters' Elemental RES by 10%.
Increases the Level of Jade Screen by 3.
When Starshatter is used, Ningguang gains 7 Star Jades.
